name: imoin
title: imoin
description: Monitor your icinga or nagios instance.

preferences.name: extensions.imoin.cgipath
preferences.title: Path to icinga/nagios
preferences.description: Complete path to cgi-bin/, e.g. https://www.examle.com/icinga/cgi-bin/

options.label: Basic auth through Firefox Password Manager

preferences.name: extensions.imoin.authentication.username
preferences.title: Username (optional)
preferences.description: Identify the Firefox Password Manager enty by this username, if multiple entries exist. This is case sensitive.

preferences.name: extensions.imoin.panel.width
preferences.title: Panel width
preferences.description: The width of the panel in pixels.

preferences.name: extensions.imoin.panel.height
preferences.title: Panel height
preferences.description: The height of the panel in pixels.

author: Erik Wegner
